physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Multiple flat warts on the face, head, and hands. CD4-positive T lymphocytopenia with CD4 count of 250 cells/mm3.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially treated with interferon gamma-1b, leading to a reduction in warts; followed by interferon alfa-2b leading to regression of warts. There was a relapse after brief treatment interruptions.
